name: disc position
explanation: Where the disc is placed after violations/fouls (e.g. returning to thrower, brick mark, goal line)

name: stall count
explanation: How the stall count is adjusted after calls (e.g. reset to 1, add 1, resume at 6)

name: player positioning
explanation: Where players must move/return after calls (e.g. back to spot of throw/call)

name: possession
explanation: Which team gains/retains possession after violations/fouls

name: pivot location
explanation: Where the thrower must establish their pivot foot after violations

name: score
explanation: Whether a goal stands or is nullified after violations/fouls

name: card
explanation: Whether a card is issued after violations/fouls
